title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2020/94 of 4 August 1994 concerning the stopping of fishing for cod by vessels flying the flag of the United Kingdom
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2020/94 of 4 August 1994 concerning the stopping of fishing for cod by vessels flying the flag of the United Kingdom
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of cod in the waters of ICES divisions I, II b by vessels flying the flag of the United Kingdom or registered in the United Kingdom are deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to the United Kingdom for 1994.
Fishing for cod in the waters of ICES divisions I, II b by vessels flying the flag of the United Kingdom or registered in the United Kingdom is prohibited, as well as the retention on board, the transhipment and the landing of such stock captured by the  abovementioned vessels after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 20 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 August 1994.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 261, 20. 10. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 341, 31. 12. 1993, p. 1.
